sub_title: Project Administrator @ Worldwide | IT Tech & Leisure Project Management
summary:
I am the Disentangler: I am a creative and experienced problem-solving consultant who ensures that problems and undesirable situations for all kinds of organizations are effectively untangled and resolved, so that they can move on.

This makes me unique and difficult to fit into a box. I adapt to any organization and any problem or project that is difficult, needs to be untangled, and where different thinking and non-standard solutions may be needed to move forward.

www.deontknoper.com

As an independent consultant I have worked all over the world as a solver in different situations. Sometimes it concerns financial situations, government projects or stalled technical projects at multinationals. And sometimes it's about rides, amusement parks and illusion effects in shows. What binds all these projects together is that they are complex situations that I have untangled and solved.

If your situation needs more than a project manager or consultant, it's time for the Disentangler.

I use my creative way of thinking as a service and have developed my own specific methodology to solve complex problems. I have a reputation for finding out-of-the-box solutions and I am asked all over the world for complex cases. I am inspired by difficult issues and untangling and solving them has become my service. By looking at your situation in my own way, I find a way out that others have not seen.

Over the years, and with the help of many experts, I've developed my own process and software tool to deal with everything you deal with.

I will solve your problem: erikvisser@deontknoper.com. 
Let me know what's on your mind and we'll figure it out together.

 Erik Visser
- The Disentangler-

contributors.headline: Project Administrator @ Worldwide | IT Tech & Leisure Project Management

projects.title: Disaster training
projects.description:
In the middle of a city a truck filled with gasoline has just crashed with a schoolbus. The truck drove into several houses, is leaking and can explode any second. The schoolbus, which turns out to be one of three, filled with people, mostly kids, is on fire.
How to get information, how to provide information, who does what, who talks with who...? In short how do you manage such a disaster as local government?
A very realistic training, proven very valuable for all parties involved.

projects.title: Karachi Theme park
projects.description:
Masterplan. The plan was to build a world class theme park connected to a large housing development project done by the State Bank of Pakistan. 
Many development companies from Dubai are focussing on Karachi now that Dubai itself is packed already with projects. Karachi is the next city to grow rapidly.
At this moment we in initiation phase. Very basic Initial layouts and designs have been made and when we get the go-signal we will put some serious magic and adventures in Pakistan.

profile_positions.description: I am currently assisting and help solving problems with the NOW project at UWV. Meanwhile I am (finally) studying and on my way to earn my certificates and diploma for project management.
profile_positions.title: Project assistant

profile_positions.description:
I am a creative and experienced problem solver who ensures that problems that organisations encounter are untangled and solved effectively so that they can move on for all kinds of organizations.

I have a lot of experience as a problem solver for leisure and entertainment, from technology to master plans, but I have also worked on start-ups and financial issues.
Because of my creative background and because my experience is so diverse, having worked on over 100 projects, I often see solutions where others don't.

I love you to tell me what is holding you back, and I will solve it for you.

Together with a number of experts, I have developed a formula with which I can quickly and effectively understand complex situations and change them to a positive result. This can be within an organizational project, but also, for example, a financial situation, problems with design, starting up a company, or a technical problem. And I now offer my expertise as a service all over the world.

My strength is that I think differently than most people. I can think just as well in a world of unicorns and dragons, as in a world of money and technology.

All this has given me a strong and varied experience. Compared to others, I will definitely stand out for my not so standard history and character, my unique way of thinking about solving problems and dealing with big projects. I think of solutions.

And I think if you have a problem, we can solve it together.
profile_positions.title: The disentangler

profile_positions.location: Netherlands | Austria | China | Philippines | Spain | Canada | Peru
profile_positions.description:
At various companies I was responsible for the development and realization of attractions. I have come up with techniques such as a new kind of circular LED screen for a simulator in Dubai, but also helped develop complete attractions and amusement parks, such as Mount Sumeru, and The Red Chamber in China. My expertise became finding creative and technical solutions. But I'm also good at making master plans. For example, I made the master plan for Jazzland (US), Adventure World (Poland and Peru), Discovery Land (Pakistan). And I have extensive experience in presenting ideas focused on different stakeholders, so that we sometimes have three or four versions of a presentation. I have been in charge of several large-scale projects with large budgets. In order to be able to deal with these kinds of large projects, I have made a software program myself together with an IT wizard, which is perfect for complex matters, and which partly works based on principles such as Lean or Scrum so that the connections can be made easily for me. , and tracked. Confidentiality is extremely important for all these types of projects. Here too I have gained extensive experience in international transactions, dealing with international regulations and complex logistics.
Keywords: Technical, Design, Construction, Management, Imagination, Business Reviews, Reports, Leadership, Out-of-the-Box, Lean, Scrum, Inventing, Framework, International, Payments.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Leisure

profile_positions.description:
For a large number of illusionists, such as Hans Klok and Christian Farla, I have designed and built illusions (in 3D). This ranged from gliding illusions to appearing engines. For various theater shows I made rundowns and quesheets, and worked on the effects. The most famous illusionist in the Middle East, Afzaal Afridi in Pakistan, I have recently helped twice with a touring show called 'The Fantasists'. In addition, as a project manager I made a number of hybrid and effects shows for amusement parks, such as a large fountain show in Xi'an where the spectators stood between the fountains, and a fountain show with actors and large puppets in Vietnam. Linked to this, I have devised an own IP for organizations, characters and identity, with which stories can be conveyed more easily. Three of my shows have won an international award. 
Keywords: Creative, Design, Project manager, Logistics, Master planning, Solutions, Purchasing, Construction, Magic, Fantasy, IP, Identity.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Entertainment

profile_positions.description:
For this new platform for supply and demand of work within the Leisure sector, I worked with the owners on the business plan and initiation plan, which means that this platform has now been started, but has not yet got off the ground due to the Corona crisis.
Keywords: Startup, Business plans, Planning.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Voor top-illusionist Afzaal Afridi nieuwe illusie effecten ontwikkeld voor hun magic show waarmee ze twee seizoenen in theaters in het Midden Oosten hebben gestaan.
profile_positions.title: Creative Consultant

profile_positions.description:
2017 tot 2019 | Creative Developer @ Unlimited Leisure
Wereldwijd leisure projecten voorzien van ‘magie’. Naast visuele effecten ook creatief verantwoordelijk voor een 3D film, en een complex volgsysteem. Dit waren grote budgetten.
profile_positions.title: Creative Director

profile_positions.description:
Within the municipality I worked on projects such as 'De Nieuwe Huisvesting', 'Crisis Team Customer Contact', 'Equal Customer Contact' and an app for reporting notifications. Thanks to these projects, all teams work with the same information towards residents.
Keywords: Communication, Innovation, KYC.
profile_positions.title: Project Consultant

profile_positions.description: Toen Ziggo besloot interactief te worden heb ik het proces van de koppeling van de functionaliteit met de eigen systemen begeleid vanuit de gebruikerskant.
profile_positions.title: Problem Manager

profile_positions.description:
Around this time, insurance companies had to pay back customers who had taken out problematic products. I helped to devise internal processes linked to customer contacts. As a result, we always had a good overview of which questions and requests come in, and how to deal with them. Here I worked a lot within periodic consultations and procedures for 'change requests'. Although the cases were the same, internal procedures at all authorities turned out to be slightly different. I have learned to work outside of frameworks but within structures.
Keywords: Financial, Communication, Projects, Processes, Change Requests.
profile_positions.title: Project Consultant

profile_positions.description:
At Postbank, I contributed to solving fraud cases that affected customers and creating protocols for detecting and preventing fraud. At that time, terms such as wwft and counterterrorism were still unknown within the banking sector. Skimming and Phishing was on the rise. And we have taken the first procedural steps for this. For the tax authorities I gave people advice on how to file their tax return.
Keywords: Projects, Accounts, Reports, Wft, Wwft, Fraud detection.
profile_positions.title: Project Consultant

volunteer_experiences.description:
Ik ben als deelnemer betrokken bij de Alliantie van de Digitale Inclusie, die als doel heeft de digitale wereld voor iedereen toegankelijk te maken. Opgericht door  Instituut voor Beeld & Geluid, Vodafone/Ziggo, prinses Laurentien en Ministerie van Binnenlandse Zaken. 
Tijdens bijeenkomsten brainstormen we over hoe we iedereen digitaal mee kunnen krijgen. Dit doe ik samen met beleidsmakers van oa Rabobank, ABN AMRO, Agis, Meta, Norstat, Oefenen.nl, Seniorenweb, Aegon, Achmea, diverse gemeenten, Informatiepunten  Overheid in bibliotheken, Digihulplijn, Ouderenfonds, Portera, ASML, Verbond van Verzekeraars, Nederlandse Betaalvereniging en tientallen andere grote organisaties.
